H0.text: Which mythical beings were said to inhabit the slopes of Mount Etna. Titans

H1.text: Which mythical beings were said to inhabit the slopes of Mount Etna. Centaurs

H2.text: Which mythical beings were said to inhabit the slopes of Mount Etna. Satyrs

H3.text: Which mythical beings were said to inhabit the slopes of Mount Etna. CYCLOPS

A4.text: Euripides locates Odysseus' Cyclopes on the island of Sicily, near the volcano Mount Etna

A5.text: In Book 3 of the Aeneid, Aeneas comes to the land of the Cyclopes, while 'near at hand Aetna thunders'
